title: Eddie Redmayne looks besotted as he walks red carpet with wife Hannah Bagshawe in London
text:
They're one of Hollywood's strongest couples after tying the knot in 2014 and becoming proud parents to their two children.

And Eddie Redmayne and his wife Hannah Bagshawe looked every inch the happy couple as they attended The Aeronauts premiere in London on Monday.

The Oscar-winner, 37, and his PR executive love, 35, oozed elegance as they walked the red carpet in striking tailored outfits.

Besotted: Eddie Redmayne, 37, and wife Hannah Bagshawe, 35, both looked stylish in tailored suits as they attended the premiere for his new film The Aeronauts in London on Monday

Eddie, who stars as scientist James Glaisher in the upcoming film, channeled his old English charm in his mustard velour suit.

He accompanied it with a matching tie and yellow shirt and donned a pair of smart brown shoes to complete the look.

Eddie - who is colour blind - relies on his wife of four years, public relations executive Hannah, to style him for the red carpet.

Looking sharp: Eddie donned a mustard velour suit with a matching shirt and tie for the event

Couple: The pair couldn't stop smiling at each other as they walked the red carpet on Monday

The stylish mother of Luke, one, and Iris, three, looked sensational in a lacy black suit which covered her shoes completely.

Hannah wore her sleek blonde tresses down for the premiere and tucked the front of her hair behind her ears using two pretty silver clips.

She kept her makeup minimal for the event, adding just a touch of mascara and a light lipstick.

Eddie acts in the new movie with his Theory Of Everything co-star Felicity Jones.

Together: Hannah looked glamorous in a black lacy suit which covered her shoes as she walked with her husband on the red carpet

Red carpet: Eddie plays scientist James Glaisher in the new film and stars alongside Felicity Jones as pilot Amelia Wren. The actor is pictured with his wife Hannah at the premiere

Felicity, 35, exuded elegance in a sheer one-shouldered gold gown which cinched her in at the waist with a black bow before falling out into a voluminous pleated skirt.

The Star Wars star's black peep toes heels were just visible underneath the show-stopping gown and elongated her tremendous pins.

Felicity wore her brunette locks in an elegant chignon and accentuated her English rose complexion with a glamorous make-up look.

Mum and dad: Hannah's suit featured lacy statement arms while Eddie completed his yellow look with a smart pair of brown shoes

The film's plot follows pilot Amelia Wren (Felicity) and scientist James Glaisher (Eddie) as they find themselves in perilous life-threatening situations while attempting to make discoveries in a hot air balloon.

Come 1862, the pair attempted to fly higher than anyone ever had before in a hot air balloon to discover more about the weather.

The attempt is still a world record to this day. The Aeronauts currently holds an 86 per cent critic approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes.

The Aeronauts comes to UK cinemas on Wednesday November 6.

Stylish: Hannah, who tucked her hair behind her ears with two pretty clips, held onto her husband's arm as they arrived at the venue and he adjusted his tie

Together: Hannah and Eddie are parents to their children Luke, one, and three-year-old Iris
description: Eddie Redmayne, 37, and wife Hannah Bagshawe, 35, looked every inch the happy couple at The Aeronauts premiere in London on Monday. The pair both opted for a tailored look.
